## AWSBuckets.putFile() method

Upload a file to a bucket

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
putFile(bucketName: string, filePath: string, file: Readable | Buffer, options?: PutFileOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  bucketName | string | Bucket name |
|  filePath | string | File key on the cloud |
|  file | Readable \| Buffer | File content |
|  options | [PutFileOptions](./api-buckets.putfileoptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Additional settings such as storage class |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

AWS Storage classes: STANDARD \| REDUCED\_REDUNDANCY \| STANDARD\_IA \| ONEZONE\_IA \| INTELLIGENT\_TIERING \| GLACIER \| DEEP\_ARCHIVE \| OUTPOSTS \| GLACIER\_IR
